name: Welsh Rabbit
recipeIngredient: Freshly ground black pepper to taste
2 ounces Cheddar cheese, preferably New York State sharp, thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Remove the crusts of the bread. Cut the slices diagonally in half to make 4 triangles. Lightly toast the bread.

In a bowl, combine the butter, Worcestershire sauce, pepper and mustard. Spread the mixture onto the toast. Top with the Cheddar cheese. Place under the broiler and heat until bubbly, about 2 to 3 minutes. Serve at once.
